channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: CrowdStrike slumps more than 6% on weak earnings outlook, overhang from outage costs
item.description: CrowdStrike shares dropped 6% after it issued weak earnings guidance and signaled ongoing pressure from its global IT outage in July.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: MongoDB plummets 20% as weak outlook overshadows strong quarterly results
item.description: MongoDB shares plummeted more than 20% after the database software maker shared weak guidance that signaled a slowdown in growth.

item.title: Macy's turnaround starts to take shape, but ailing stores weigh on quarterly results
item.description: Macy's is in the midst of an aggressive strategy to close underperforming stores and invest in better performing locations as it looks to reverse sale...

item.title: Lufthansa hopeful Trump administration will spur Boeing deliveries as delays hit bottom line
item.description: The German airline group has been struggling with its ageing fleet as hundreds of newer models face delivery delays.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: MongoDB shares sink after company issues weak guidance
item.description: MongoDB's earnings forecast for the 2026 fiscal year came in well below Wall Street expectations.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
